title: Active to passive voice conversion
objective: To learn conversion of sentence from active voice to passive voice.
learningOutcome: Student will able to learn about the conversion of sentence from active voice to passive voice.
act1: In this activity, learn about the conversion of sentences from active voice to passive voice.
act2: Observe the structure of the active voice sentence and convert it into passive voice.
act3: Click on "VERIFY" to verify the converted sentence.
act4: Detailed feedback is provided for the converted sentence.
instr1: Select the tense from the dropdown to generate the sentence.
instr2: A sentence is generated in the active voice.
instr3: Convert the active voice sentence to passive voice.
instr4: Rearranged the words of the passive voice sentence to make a correct sentence.
instr6: Click on "VERIFY" to check the passive voice sentence.
instr7: Click on "NEXT" to view the next sentence.
hint1: In passive voice, the positions of Subject and Object are interchanged.
hint2: In passive voice, Past Participle (3rd form of Verb) is always used as Main verb.
hint3: In passive voice, Helping Verb (if present) precedes the Main Verb, and depends on Subject and tense.
hint4: In passive voice, most of the times, the word by is used before Subject.

proc2: The sentence displayed is in the active voice.
proc3: Now, rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding Passive voice of the given sentence.
proc4: Click on "Hint" icon to view hints.
proc5: Click on "VERIFY" to check whether the Passive voice is properly constructed and check the feedback displayed below.
proc6: Click on "NEXT" to view the next sentence.
